name: The Duty of The Knight
description:
The duty of the knight is top-down roguelike I developed in my first year at the IIM school.

An incoming war, a hero and his will of becoming stronger to protect his family.
Dive into the dungeon and get out of it as the hero you've always been .

Many of those assets are not mine. Thanks to all the person who helped me by producing them.

Hope you'll enjoy playing it
